definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The small demo program shows how to use the oscilloscope control.
sentences.chinese: 小演示程序演示了如何使用示波器的控制。

sentences.english: VB oscilloscope function of a CAD design, easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 用VB实现示波器功能的一个CAD设计，很好用。

sentences.english: The oscilloscope bandwidth set at 20MHz with co-axial probe.
sentences.chinese: 示波器带宽设为20兆赫兹，同轴探头。

sentences.english: Bandwidth decides oscillograph measures ability basically to signal.
sentences.chinese: 带宽抉择示波器对信号的根基测量能力。

sentences.english: Trace 3 is from an oscilloscope probe placed 300mm away from the secondary coil.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪3示波器探头放在远离次级线圈300毫米。

sentences.english: As an example of application, the control functions for oscilloscopes have been implemented in a VXI-GPIB heterogeneous system using such modules.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个用例，通过本模块实现了对示波器的控制。

sentences.english: Make optical power as high as possible and waveform displayed by oscillograph big enough.
sentences.chinese: 使光功率尽量高，示波器显示的波形足够大。

sentences.english: This information may be displayed on oscilloscopes for doctors to analyze.
sentences.chinese: 这些信息可以在示波器上显示，以供医生分析。

sentences.english: Passive voltage probe is the probe with the most commonly used oscillograph .
sentences.chinese: 无源电压探头是示波器最常用的探头。

sentences.english: A design of portable digital oscillograph based on MCU is proposed in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 示威是过去在级别的示波器，这是连接的驱动器。

sentences.english: Like oscilloscopes to achieve the same interface shows.
sentences.chinese: 实现像示波器一样的界面显示。

sentences.english: In essence, the probe is the first link in the oscilloscope measurement chain.
sentences.chinese: 从本质上看，探头是示波器测量链中的首要环节。

sentences.english: Then superimposed pseudo-random signal with an oscilloscope display eye.
sentences.chinese: 然后叠加伪随机信号用示波器显示眼图。

sentences.english: We are Shenzhen Oscilloscopes RIGOL agent and there is a formal power of attorney.
sentences.chinese: 我们是普源示波器的深圳总代理并有正式的授权书。

sentences.english: This is a virtual oscilloscope, I believe many people will apply.
sentences.chinese: 这是个虚拟的示波器，相信很多人都会用到。

sentences.english: Which have been gained on the oscilloscope understanding.
sentences.chinese: 由此对示波器也有了一定的了解。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
